encounter.name: Mrs Mandel/Pilichin
encounter.precis: Reintroduce Pilichin. Make Fulcades more sinister
encounter.progression: Elze Keller can tell them that the seal was dropped and broken a few years ago and replaced..
encounter.strategy: Save the girl or fight pilichin
encounter.outs: Pilichin can phase out when he's had enough.

details.p: Mrs Mandel will greet them. Say Elize is not there. If they want to look around Mrs Mandel is fine by that.

Mrs Mandel/Pilichins work is done and she/he is cleaning up loose ends. She will go into the cellar where Elize is tied unconscious and lying on the floor and set a fire. The characters will smell the smoke. Mr Mandel is dead under some wood in the corner and has been for a few weeks, stabbed in the back and partially eaten.
